mapper.select: SELECT BASE_CODE,BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ORDER BY BASE_SORT asc

SELECT PM_IDX,PM_PART_CODE,PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME,PM_PART_PLANT_CODE,PM_PART_COUNTRY,PM_QUALITY,PM_STATUS,PM_CHEMICAL_YN FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA spd INNER JOIN SC_PART_CODE spc ON spd.PM_PART_CODE = spc.PART_CODE WHERE PM_IDX = #{idx}
SELECT BASE_CODE,BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='APPVSTATUS' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ORDER BY BASE_SORT asc

SELECT PM_IDX ,PM_PART_CODE ,pc.PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME --,bc.base_value as PM_PLANT ,PM_PART_PLANT_CODE --,pc.PART_COUNTRY as PM_COUNTRY ,PM_PART_COUNTRY ,ui.USER_NAME as PM_REG_USER ,NVL(PM_ACTIVE_YN, ' ') as PM_ACTIVE_YN ,NVL(BASE_NAME , ' ') as PM_APPROVAL_STATUS ,NVL(TO_CHAR(PM_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),' ') as PM_APPROVAL_DATE ,NVL(TO_CHAR(PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'),' ') as PM_REQUEST_APPROVAL_DATE FROM SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA pmd LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_PART_CODE pc ON pmd.PM_PART_CODE = pc.PART_CODE --LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Base_code, base_value FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ) bc ON pc.PLANT_CODE = bc.base_code LEFT JOIN (SELECT BASE_NAME, BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE AND GROUP_CODE='PartApproval') sbc ON pmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS = sbc.BASE_VALUE LEFT OUTER JOIN SC_USER_INFO ui ON pmd.PM_REG_USER = ui.USER_IDX WHERE 1 =1
AND (PM_PART_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_CODE}), '%'))
AND (PM_PART_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PART_NAME}), '%'))
AND (ui.USER_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{REG_USER}), '%'))
AND (PM_ACTIVE_YN = #{PM_ACTIVE_YN})
AND (PM_PART_PLANT_CODE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_PLANT}), '%'))
AND (PM_APPROVAL_STATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{PM_APPROVAL_STATUS}), '%'))
AND (PM_REG_DATE > #{PM_SDATE})
AND (PM_REG_DATE <= #{PM_EDATE})

SELECT PART_CODE,COM_NATION AS PART_COUNTRY,PART_NAME,bc.BASE_VALUE FROM SC_PART_CODE pc LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT Base_code, base_value FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE ='PLANT' AND GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE ) bc ON pc.PLANT_CODE = bc.base_code INNER JOIN SC_COMPANY_CODE scc ON pc.COM_CODE = scc.COM_CODE

SELECT PART_CODE as PM_PART_CODE ,PART_NAME as PM_PART_NAME, BASE_NAME AS PM_APPROVAL_STATUS ,spmd.PM_ACTIVE_YN FROM SC_PART_CODE spc INNER JOIN SC_PART_MANAGEMENT_DATA spmd ON spc.PART_CODE = spmd.PM_PART_CODE AND spc.COM_CODE = spmd.PM_COM_CODE AND spc.PLANT_CODE = spmd.PM_PART_PLANT_CODE LEFT JOIN (SELECT BASE_NAME, BASE_VALUE FROM SC_BASE_CODE WHERE GROUP_CODE != BASE_CODE AND GROUP_CODE='PartApproval') sbc ON spmd.PM_APPROVAL_STATUS = sbc.BASE_VALUE WHERE spmd.PM_IDX =#{idx}

SELECT SVHC_IDX,PM_IDX,DATA_GUBUN,NVL(CONFIRM_DATE, ' ') AS CONFIRM_DATE,NVL(APPLICABLE_NO,' ') AS APPLICABLE_NO ,NVL(FILE_PATH,' ') AS FILE_PATH,NVL(FILE_NAME,' ') AS FILE_NAME,NVL(WARRANTY_ITEM,' ') AS WARRANTY_ITEM FROM SC_PART_MGMT_SVHC_DATA WHERE PM_IDX=#{idx}
SELECT NVL(DECL_NUM,DECL_SUB_NUM) AS DECL_NUM ,DECL_NAME, DECL_CASNUM,NVL(DECL_WEIGHT,' ') AS DECL_WEIGHT ,NVL(DECL_CLASS, ' ') AS DECL_CLASS FROM SC_DECLARATION_DATA

SELECT DECL_IDX,PM_IDX,DATA_GUBUN,NVL(CONFIRM_DATE, ' ') AS CONFIRM_DATE,NVL(APPLICABLE_NO,' ') AS APPLICABLE_NO ,NVL(FILE_PATH,' ') AS FILE_PATH,NVL(FILE_NAME,' ') AS FILE_NAME,NVL(WARRANTY_ITEM,' ') AS WARRANTY_ITEM FROM SC_PART_MGMT_DECLARATION_DATA WHERE PM_IDX=#{idx}
